AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the black Dodge pickup truck: Vehicle driven by the defendant, not recognized as a local vehicle by Agent Jorge Luis Trevino

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the vehicle: Refers to the white Malibu sedan in this context, designed to hold five people
